Texts.Chs: 与筛分机相比，破岩机速度较慢，且需要更多的能源，但与单与筛分机相比，它可以提取更多资源。 如果条件允许，你可以把破石机升级为更高效率的升级到^orange;碎岩机^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Compared to the Sifter, the Rock Breaker is slower and needs more power, but it allows for much more resource extracting than the Sifter alone. Upgrade to a ^orange;Rock Crusher^reset; when you can, as those are much more efficient.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;筛分机^reset;可能适合拉碎松散的物料，但是要^green;破碎^reset;岩石，如^orange;鹅卵石^reset;或^orange;砾岩^reset;，则需要^orange;破石机^reset;。现在去^orange;电子设备制造机^white;制造一台吧。
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Sifter^reset; is great for pulling apart loose materials, but to break up ^green;stone types^reset; like ^orange;cobblestone^reset; or ^orange;conglomerate^reset; you'll need a ^orange;Rock Breaker^reset;. Build one now at your ^orange;Electronics Center^;.
